OOC: Okay, I would like to say that this election thing is going over 
board.  The council are the ones that decide if there is an election 
and from what I have seen, the council never said that there would be 
one.  So please stop with all of these OOC about if you were on 
council you would do this or that.  And for if you would ban each 
other or not, that really isn't an issue.  Because if you did ban 
someone with no reason then it would show in the records and you 
would be excuse from the council.  Also, trying to get yours and 
other ideas noticed.  That is not really going to happen, because 
when I was a council member I said if anyone has ideas that they 
could send me an email and I would talk to the council about yet no 
one ever did except once or twice and I brought it up to the 
council.  As far as your own ideas, don't hold your breathe.  It 
takes 75% of the council to approve something and then you have to 
pester rAuq to change the rule site which he is to lazy to do most of 
the time.:)  So basically what you are looking for in a council 
member is someone who can moderate people at the right times.  
Someone who gets along with the rest of the council.  Someone who 
will pester rAuq(Because he updates the sites).  So now if there is 
an election, I will run.  I will listen to everyones ideas(IF they 
send them to me.)  I will continue to update the events page(Come on 
people send me events).  I will pester rAuq(Already do that:)).  I 
will do whatever people want me to do(except throw leaves at 
people).  So if you read this then I am amazed if you didn't then I 
don't care about you(of coarse you wouldn't know that because YOU 
DIDN'T READ IT!!!.  Again I would like to ask everyone to cut down on 
the OOCs because they can get annoying.  As always please send me 
events so I can update the events page.  HAVE A NICE DAY!!!

      
                Sincerly,
                One time founder and One time council member Hugar
